sourcesContent:
<template>
  <svg id="barcode"></svg> <!-- SVG to display the barcode -->
</template>

<script>
import JsBarcode from 'jsbarcode';
import { onMounted, watch, ref } from 'vue';

export default {
  props: {
    sku: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    }
  },
  setup(props) {
    const svgRef = ref(null);

    const generateBarcode = (sku) => {
      if (sku.length < 13) {
        sku = sku.padStart(13, '0');
      } else if (sku.length > 13) {
        sku = sku.slice(0, 13);
      }

      JsBarcode(svgRef.value, sku, {
        format: 'EAN13',
        lineColor: '#000',
        width: 2,
        height: 50,
        displayValue: true
      });
    };

    onMounted(() => generateBarcode(props.sku));

    watch(() => props.sku, (newSku) => {
      generateBarcode(newSku);
    });

    return {
      svgRef
    };
  }
};
</script>
